p: A representative subsample of 100 g of homogenized soil out of every beech-soil-mesocosm was immediately extracted in the field with 0.5 M K 2SO 4 at a soil:solution ratio of 1:1.5. Addition of K 2SO 4 solution was followed by 1 hour of shaking at 240 rotations per minute. After shaking, extracts were vacuum filtered using pumps and glass fibre filters [ 15]. Subsamples of the extract were transferred into different tubes and immediately frozen in the field for later analysis of (1) total organic C and total N concentrations, (2) NH 4 + and NO 3 - concentrations, (3) 15N enrichment in NH 4 +, NO 3 - and dissolved organic N (DON), and (4) 15N enrichment in total dissolved (organic + mineral) N.
